 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִרְפַּד‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==a desert-plant, contrasted with== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲדַס‎</span>, ***myrtle:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲלֶה הֲדַס‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת הַסּ‎</span> [[Isa.55.13|Isa 55:13]] not clearly identified; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">κόνυζα</span>, [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***urtica***.
